lines.text: Dr Golfrey pulls back the bed clothes to show Abel Worthy lying with a toilet seat stuck to his posterior]
Well, girl. What's the matter with you? Never come across anything like that before?
Oh yes, doctor, but never framed!
[Joanna's driving instructor has recommended her to "treat the examiner as your friend" so she tries a flippant remark]
Do you mind if I smoke?
I don't mind if you curl at the edges.
You know Dr Golfrey's secretary? That flighty young thing? Well, she's flown.
